extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected System and Version
extracted_playbook.description: Determine if the system is affected by checking the installed versions of Microsoft Windows, Azure, Office, Windows Defender, SQL Server, and DNS Server.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the system affected by the vulnerability?

extracted_playbook.title: Apply Updates
extracted_playbook.description: Apply the latest security updates to all affected Microsoft products, including Windows, Azure, Office, Windows Defender, SQL Server, and DNS Server.
